title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Cursed Artifact
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A compulsive souvenir collector buys an antique jade figurine from a Moroccan night market, not realizing it's a soul vessel that gradually drains the life force of its owner over seven days.

death_teaser: You get what you pay for. And then some.
